EmailTemplate.name: Bus schedule for 2014.3.28
EmailTemplate.subject: Bus schedule for 2014.3.28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
This coming Friday, 28th March is the last day of Term 2. School will finish at 12:00pm. Bus timetables for this day are now available. Please CLICK HERE or visit our website http://www.bsg.org.cn/en/school-services/school-buses.aspx to view or download the timetable.
Should you have any questions or if you require further information, please feel free to contact me.
Best Regard,
Claire Guo
Facility Assistant
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
——————————————————————————————————————
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International
